name: jarring
content:
jarring adjective
(NOT PLEASANT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a jarring sight, sound, or experience is so different or unexpected that it has a strong and unpleasant effect on something or someone: a jarring cry/chord jarring colours a jarring experience

(NOT RIGHT)
wrong or unsuitable: a jarring contrast

different from surrounding or usual things, or disagreeing with others, and therefore surprising or upsetting: a jarring succession of images The band took a new, if jarring, approach to this music.
